author: markt
msg: Fix bug 22041. Dynamic proxies are now supported as sesison objects.

author: remm
msg: - It would be good if other committers were updating the changelog too :)

author: remm
msg: - Add back the reconnection logic to JDBC realm, which was removed for wrong reasons. From what I saw, it causes major issues with MySQL otherwise
(obviously, another solution is to use the better data source realm).

author: billbarker
msg: Don't copy the struts tld files (use the ones in struts.jar).  Use the standard struts tld URI.
